price: Wọ́n sọ pé: “Dájúdájú Wọ́n rán wa níṣẹ́ sí ìjọ ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ ni
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
